decision_conditions:
The development hereby permitted shall be begun no later than the  expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the requirements of Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
description: Demolish existing buildings. Erection of a ten storey building comprising of 50 flats and ground floor commercial floorspace (Use Class B1/D1) (Summary)
